document_data.name: Opallin River
document_data.mainbody: The '''Opallin River''' was a prominent river found within the [[Pasocada Basin]] of northern [[Maztica]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Geography: The Opallin River branched from the larger [[Pasocada River]] where the [[Azuposi]] pueblo of [[Opallinoc]] was founded. The river flowed south then southeast for approximately {{SI|15|mi|k|long=yes}}. The river branched at [[Kinopal]] with the western branch terminating in the land of the [[Dog People]] while the eastern branch terminated within the lands of the [[Rockjaw clan]].
document_data.Notable Locations: Settlements found along the shores of the Opallin River included Opallinoc, Kinopal, [[Keshtin Pueblo]], [[Mitzlato]], and [[Kin Elbhaz]].
